meta_info.name: ELEMENT
meta_info.description: The leaf variant of `ITEM`, to which a `DATA_VALUE` instance is attached.

functions.name: is_null
functions.meaning: True if value logically not known, e.g. if indeterminate, not asked etc.

attributes.name: null_flavour
attributes.description: Flavour of null value, e.g. `253|unknown|`, `271|no information|`, `272|masked|`, and `273|not applicable|`.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Property representing leaf value object of `ELEMENT`. In real data, any concrete subtype of `DATA_VALUE` can be used.

attributes.name: null_reason
attributes.description: Optional specific reason for null value; if set, `_null_flavour_` must be set. Null reason may apply only to a minority of clinical data, commonly needed in reporting contexts.
